name: Casa Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: Stayed on a Friday evening on the millionaire deal with evening meal and breakfast. Good value for money. Hotel is lovely, room was great, nice big comfy bed, big walk in shower. Evening meal was fantastic, customer service amazing the waitresses were so nice and very helpful. I would definitely stop again.
reviews.title: Fantastic time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I always stop at the Casa when in the Midlands and have to say its everything and more a business traveller will ever need.
reviews.title: One small complaint

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My only complaint is they never offer a complimentary room up-grade even when rooms are available.
reviews.title: Fantastic meal at a fantastic hotel - thank you!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Come on Mr Perez it's the only thing I can fault you on!
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel and Great Food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed at this beautifully modern hotel before & would easily rate the same as 5*****, do not hesitate to book a room here!
reviews.title: Took some of the pain out of a speed awareness course

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As a regular trip advisor contributor, I rarely give 5 stars, but credit where it is due, this hotel deserves 5 stars! Just can't fault it. Staff, food, service, beds, breakfast, reception, decor, everything in fact is top class. We will certainly be back and hope to try the suite next time. Thank you Casa for a lovely stay.
reviews.title: Excellent, can't fault it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: My experience at casa was Brilliant! And i would recommend this place to anyone who wants to get away for a night or two. I booked the Picasso suite for me and my bf and i can not explain how beautiful it was ... From the room to the jacuzzi to the breakfast!!!! Absolutely gutted i only booked one night but all in all it is one if the best hotels i have stayed in by far.
reviews.title: Wow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some improvements however, there needs to some kind of ipod dock or cd player in the room because the music chanels are limited and it ia nice to relax with some music especially when using the jacuzzi...also i don't understand why there wasn't any toothpaste n in the bathroom [i would expect this in a suite]
reviews.title: Wow!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: Apart from that tho... Thumbs up.
reviews.title: Really excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just got back from an overnight stay at the Casa Hotel. Beautiful modern hotel, room clean and comfortable big bed. Coffee and tea making facilities in the room, and a fresh pint of milk in the fridge, along with small bottles of water. Bathroom spotless with large waterfall shower and big fluffy towels. Small touches like the free safe, iron and ironing board, powerful hairdryer, quality furniture, free reliable internet connection, air con, and bathroom night light made this hotel stand out above the rest.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hot tub !!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I use this hotel for meetings and call into the cafe bar area a great deal. Very good young staff who are very attentive. Great coffees and the lunches in the bar are excellent - especially the Mexican fajita dish which is beautifully served and big enough to share.
reviews.title: best hotel in town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: Great standards throughout.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: Myself and family stayed in the Casa for a nine nights and had a wonderful stay. The beds are amazing. The only issue I have is when we arrived there was no extra bed put in our room for my daughter. We enjoyed our stay that much we decided to return for a couple extra nights but was told they were full but had a suite available. It would have been good customer service to upgrade us as we had just stayed nine nights but we had to find alternative accommodation.
reviews.title: Great Cheesecake!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall wonderful stay
reviews.title: Anniversary Stay in Casa Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Went to lunch in the bar with some colleagues from Jersey. I had the burger followed by cheesecake. Great food, very pleasant young staff who were both polite and attentive. Please don't change the cheesecake, it is very good. My guest who had the poached salmon sandwich also commented how nice it was. This place gets better and better, Chesterfield needs a quality hotel like this. Even the car park is spotless. My 5th visit and great every time. Ideal if you want to show your clients that its not all 'grim' up north.
reviews.title: Superb !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is in a strange location. I say strange because it has good road links but the standard of it is more worthy of a big city four star!
reviews.title: Made us feel like VIP's

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: We booked for our anniversary as we were visiting the Derbyshire Dales and was tempted to taste the Spanish restaurant. My wife had requested a bottle of wine for the room as it was our anniversary. Upon arrival, the hotel had made note of this and we had a very warm welcome including a card wishing us a happy anniversary.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The room we were given was clean, bright and modern. Lovely rainfall shower in the bathroom.
reviews.title: AMAZING!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We ate ate the restaurant which I have to say was excellent. The main course was like fine dining. The waiting staff made us feel like VIP's including a free drink for our anniversary. Breakfast the next morning was also great including legendary sausages!
reviews.title: FAB Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In a big city this standard of hotel would cost a mint, so I would go before they realise and put the rack rate up!
reviews.title: 50th birthday tink@live

description: Casa is Chesterfield premier four star hotel. This independent hotel is situated in the historic market town of Chesterfield, within easy reach of the beautiful Peak District and neighbouring cities, Sheffield and Nottingham. Casa is one of the only hotels in the UK that offers hot tubs on the balconies of two of our six luxury suites. Each of our 100 bedrooms are designed with comfort and luxury in mind, fully controlable air conditioning thoughout, all windows are sound-proofed and we offer some of the comfiest mattresses in the UK, rain showers in the bathrooms and 32’ LCD screens with freeview.To complement Casa’s theme, Cocina restaurant offers a menu with a Spanish twist. Our talented chefs cook using Josper charcoal ovens, flown over especially from Barcelona. Our wine list is of the highest quality, thanks to the owner‘s passion for fine wines.Our cocktail bar, Barca, is a haven of free Wi-Fi, fresh coffee, delicious food and a signature drinks, made using only the best brands and ingredients from around the world. Each of our 100 bedrooms have award winning beds, extra soundproofing, 32” televisions, free Wi-Fi and private fridges stocked with water and fresh milk. You’ll also find homemade biscuits for your tea or coffee. Our bathrooms have rain showers with controls that enable you to adjust the temperature before getting in, without getting soaked. Our rates include a hearty breakfast in the Cocina restaurant, with eggs, bacon and sausages that are sourced locally from Walton Lodge Farm, just four miles away.Our eleven meeting rooms are purpose built to offer you the latest in conferencing solutions. We are able to accommodate from two to 280 people and all of our meeting rooms have floor to ceiling windows for maximum daylight, air conditioning, complimentary high speed Wi-Fi, data projection and 32” LCD televisions.
